These offers will be available up to midnight on Cyber Monday (US East Time).
No coupon is required and we only have limited stock so please act fast :-)

## Why us?

* Intuitive, fast, in-house developed platform mc²
* IPv6 /64 subnet by default
* Native SSH Keys and user-data support
* Reverse DNS (PTR) configuration via UI / API, no ticket required
* Daily built OS images with latest updates and patches (including Windows)
* Rapid deployment (typical under 30s for Linux templates)
* We own **all** hardware and IP space
* Nx10Gbps Internet Ports (Transit / Peering), 2x40Gbps Internal Uplinks powered by Arista core networks
* Did I mention that we have BGP support? Yes, just open a ticket to verify your ASN and everything else is FULLY automated.
